title: User Authentication and Security Framework
summary: Implement secure login, multi-factor authentication, and data protection mechanisms.
description: Develop a secure authentication framework that includes multi-factor authentication (MFA), session management, and encryption for sensitive data. This ensures that customers can safely access the self-service portal, protecting their financial information and maintaining compliance with regulatory security standards.

userStories.title: Multi-Factor Authentication Setup
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to log in using multi-factor authentication so that my account remains secure from unauthorized access.

userStories.title: Secure Password Management
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to reset or update my password securely so that I can manage access credentials safely.

userStories.title: Session Timeout Configuration
userStories.description: As a customer, I want my session to log out automatically after a period of inactivity so that my data remains safe.

title: Personalized Dashboard Experience
summary: Provide a customized dashboard based on customer profile and eligibility.
description: Build an interactive dashboard that displays personalized banking services, active accounts, and recommended banking products based on user profile data. The dashboard should serve as the central point of interaction, offering quick actions and tailored recommendations for a seamless user experience.

userStories.title: Display Active Accounts Summary
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to view summaries of my account balances and transactions so that I can monitor my finances efficiently.

userStories.title: Show Personalized Offers and Services
userStories.description: As a customer, I want personalized recommendations displayed on my dashboard so I can access relevant products and services.

userStories.title: Quick Action Shortcuts
userStories.description: As a customer, I want quick links to submit service requests and view notifications so that I can complete actions faster.

title: Responsive Design and Cross-Device Compatibility
summary: Develop a responsive user interface for consistent experience across devices.
description: Design and implement a responsive user interface that provides a consistent and optimized experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. The design must support accessibility standards, fast loading times, and intuitive navigation.

userStories.title: Responsive Layout Design
userStories.description: As a customer, I want the portal layout to adapt to my screen size so that I can access it comfortably from any device.

userStories.title: Cross-Device Feature Consistency
userStories.description: As a customer, I want the same features to be available across all my devices so that my experience remains consistent.

userStories.title: Accessibility Compliance
userStories.description: As a user with accessibility needs, I want the portal to be compliant with accessibility standards so that I can navigate it easily.

title: Digital Account Opening and Service Requests
summary: Enable online account opening and service modifications via self-service workflows.
description: Develop digital workflows allowing customers to open new accounts and modify existing services online. The process must minimize manual inputs, utilize pre-filled data from user profiles, and route requests through approval mechanisms integrated with backend systems.

userStories.title: Account Opening Workflow
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to open a new account online so that I can start banking without visiting a branch.

userStories.title: Service Modification Workflow
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to modify my existing banking services online so that I can manage my needs digitally.

userStories.title: Pre-Filled Application Fields
userStories.description: As a customer, I want my known details to prepopulate in online forms so that I can complete applications quickly and accurately.

title: Document Upload and Draft Management
summary: Allow users to upload documents and save incomplete applications as drafts.
description: Create functionality for secure document uploads and enable customers to save incomplete applications as drafts for later completion. Ensure all uploaded files are validated, encrypted, and stored securely.

userStories.title: Secure Document Upload
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to upload required documents directly through the portal so that I can complete my application remotely.

userStories.title: Save Application Draft
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to save my incomplete application as a draft so that I can return later to finish it.

userStories.title: Validate Uploaded File Type and Size
userStories.description: As a system, I want to validate document types and sizes so that all uploaded files meet security and compliance requirements.

title: Notifications and Real-Time Updates
summary: Provide updates and alerts to customers through real-time notifications and emails.
description: Implement a notification framework that delivers in-portal alerts and transactional email updates in real time. This feature improves transparency, ensuring that customers are informed about the progress of their requests and actions.

userStories.title: Real-Time Request Status Updates
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to track my request status in real time so that I know exactly when actions are completed.

userStories.title: Email Notifications for Request Progress
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to receive email updates when there are changes to my requests so that I can stay informed.

userStories.title: Notification Center in Dashboard
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to view notification history in my dashboard so that I can review past alerts anytime.

title: User Interaction History and Audit Trail
summary: Maintain a record of all user interactions for visibility and compliance.
description: Implement a secure audit log that records all user actions and portal interactions. Customers can access their transaction history, while administrators retain immutable audit trails for compliance and monitoring.

userStories.title: Customer Interaction History
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to view all my previous requests and interactions so that I can track my banking activity.

userStories.title: System Audit Log Management
userStories.description: As a system admin, I want to log all customer interactions to maintain compliance and support audits.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the bank’s core banking platform.
description: Establish secure and efficient data integration between the portal and the bank’s core banking system. This ensures real-time synchronization for account updates, transaction requests, and service modifications while maintaining data accuracy.

userStories.title: Real-Time Data Sync with Core Banking
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to see updated account information from the bank’s core system in real time so that my data is always accurate.

userStories.title: Bi-Directional Data Exchange APIs
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to create APIs that allow real-time data exchange between the portal and the core system so that both stay in sync.

title: Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Develop a standalone, optimized database for efficient portal performance.
description: Design and implement an independent yet synchronized database to handle portal operations. This improves performance and reliability while reducing dependency on the core banking system. Include caching, performance tuning, and data recovery mechanisms.

userStories.title: Independent Portal Database Architecture
userStories.description: As a system architect, I want the portal to maintain its own database to ensure high performance and responsiveness.

userStories.title: Database Backup and Recovery
userStories.description: As an administrator, I want automated database checks and backups so that data is protected from accidental loss or corruption.

title: Role-Based Access Control Management
summary: Implement granular role-based access controls across the platform.
description: Develop a fine-grained RBAC framework to manage user permissions, ensuring that customers, administrators, and employees have access only to relevant data and functionalities based on their roles.

userStories.title: User Role Definition
userStories.description: As an administrator, I want to define roles and associated permissions for different user groups so that data access remains controlled.

userStories.title: Access Restrictions by Role
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to only view and use services that correspond to my role and account type so that I do not access restricted information.
